Text:
function EP03_06()
    --.起-4【7月第3週】「世界はそれを狂愛と呼ぶんだぜ」
    SaveData.Title = "世界はそれを狂愛と呼ぶんだぜ"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav")

    --//BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//SE：ゲーム音
PLAY_SE("SEb014.wav")
WAIT(600)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0429.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "This settles it! I win!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0280.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Counterattack, too bad!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0430.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Myaa!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0281.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minachin’s comeback block was way too obvious. You should try aiming for a comeback or changing your pattern to make counterattacking harder." ]])

    MSG([[ While playing games in the living room, Akira suddenly asked me this question. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0282.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "By the way, you’ve been making lunchboxes all week now, did something happen?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0431.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "You noticed that? What’s up? Did you maybe dislike having leftover side dishes for lunch?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No, the side dishes in the lunchboxes you make are all delicious even cold... like the cheesy stuffed peppers—they’re amazing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s just that it wasn’t like this before, so I wondered what changed." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0432.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Actually, in a girly way, I’ve been exchanging lunchboxes with senior Uran." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "In a girly way, huh...?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0433.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Girls do these wonderful things all the time. I never did that with the ‘Knights’ though... maybe I was holding back?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0286.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Huh? All the time... you don’t mean every day, do you?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s behavior seemed strange. What’s going on? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0287.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You’re not telling me that person has been making lunchboxes for Minachin every day, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0434.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh, I do. It’s natural for close girls to do that." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No no no. What are you saying? Girls doing that every day? That barely happens even in yuri manga." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0435.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-yuri? Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Anyway. That Uran person’s a little weird. Have you noticed anything else? What exactly is going on?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0436.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Uh, well... for example..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

STOP_BGM()

    --//BG：メインストリート（夏・朝）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    --//BU：ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0092.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Good day, Erika-san. You were about five minutes later than usual today, weren’t you?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0506.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Good day, Uran-san. I bought a pen at the convenience store on the way, so I caught the next bus." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0093.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh my. If it was a pen, I would have gladly given you as many as you wanted." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0094.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "From now on, please ask me before buying anything." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0507.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you very much!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

STOP_BGM()

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

-- PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    --//BU：アキラ（焦り・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0437.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Lately, whenever I go through the school gate, I always run into Uran-san first." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "She’s totally ambushing you. And judging by that, she’s got Minachin’s commute times down perfectly." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0438.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-yeah, maybe!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Could it be... she’s, like, an intense yuri freak?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0439.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "N-no way! She was just worried about my health the other day—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

-- STOP_BGM()

    --//BG：3F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    --//BU：ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh Erika-san. Have you come to visit the third floor again?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0096.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "But you don’t look so well... is something wrong?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0508.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I studied late last night. Maybe that’s why." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0097.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "T-that’s terrible. As your dear friend, I can’t just ignore that!" ]])

    -- //CI：ウランの胸に顔を突っ込まれるエリカ
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI056a")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,0,400)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,1000,Ease.OutQuart)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,1000,Ease.OutQuart)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask008",1000,false)

    --//SE：お肉を揉む音
PLAY_SE("SEa002.wav")

    MSG([[ Uran-san hugged me, pressing my face against her ample chest. ]])

    MSG([[ Ugh! Th-this feeling is...!? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "The ‘Knights’ all say they feel calm when they touch me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU01oa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0099.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san, please do touch my body and be healed as well." ]])
    --//SE：お肉を揉む音
PLAY_SE("SEa002.wav")
WAIT(500)
    --//SE：お肉を揉む音
PLAY_SE("SEa002.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Ah. Ah. No. _r S-soft... I’ve never felt comfort like this before... ]])

    MSG([[ It’s truly soothing. But no... as a guy, in this state... instead of calming down... I... ]])
    --//SE：お肉を揉む音
PLAY_SE("SEa002.wav")
WAIT(500)
    --//SE：お肉を揉む音
PLAY_SE("SEa002.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0509.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (N-no... stay calm, me... the “other me”...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：ウラン（笑顔）、リラ（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(45,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(45,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0270.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Erika, I brought the materials you asked for—" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(45,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0271.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Uran-senpai!? W-what are you doing!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

STOP_BGM()

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0440.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "At the time, I thought I was overreacting... but now that I think about it, maybe it really was strange." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No, even without thinking much, it’s weird... Even if girls do skinship, there’s limits." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0441.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I didn’t really understand girls’ sense of personal space... I’ll be careful, sorry." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Maybe the cause was that since the entrance ceremony, I hadn’t had any ordinary friends as Erika. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone treats me politely as ‘Onee-sama,’ and Lira is about the only one who treats me as an equal friend. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing how fiercely Lira reacted, it seems the relationship between Uran-san and me was kind of unusual. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, I still can’t tell if that Uran—boob monster—is targeting Minachin with bad intentions or is just clueless." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "There’s also a good chance she suspects Minachin’s gender, so just be careful." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0442.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-yeah, got it. I’ll be careful." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Then we resumed our game. Since I became a ‘Princess’ recently, I’ve paused my cross-dressing training and have been enjoying peaceful days. ]])

    MSG([[ I wish these peaceful days could last forever. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I never imagined I’d get caught up in the ‘Princess Election’ again and have to work hard at cross-dressing—" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0443.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Uh... could you please stop making such gloomy confessions up?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　　　◆

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_07")
end
